attributes.action: Create a position within Cabinet for an MP to reepresent Pensioners rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The elected Government shoould create a post on the cabinet to represent pensioners.
This would also be a secratary of states job, and also have a rep in other parties.
The post would involve looking into ideas sent by the pensioners parliament and other groups as to cahnges effecting state pensions and others into new ways.
Which may include RPI, and introducing  increase based on average earnings, a Council Tax reform for over 60`s, and other services.
Also getting a true figure of how many pensioners there are living within UK, and where they stand as to being a powerful tool in government decisions.
